Bash(gh issue create --title "Test cto.new integration - Add basic logging" --label "create-pr" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Test Issue for Workflow Automation

This is a test issue to verify the GitHub Actions workflow automation works correctly.

## Expected Behavior

When this issue is labeled with `create-pr`, the workflow should:
1. Trigger automatically
2. Create a new branch named `add-logging-helper-{RUN_ID}`
3. Add `utils/logging_config.py` with logging helper code
4. Add `docs/USAGE_LOGGING.md` with usage documentation
5. Commit the changes
6. Push the branch
7. Create a pull request automatically

## Success Criteria

- [ ] Workflow runs successfully
- [ ] Branch is created
- [ ] Files are added correctly
- [ ] PR is created automatically
- [ ] PR links back to this issue

## Notes

This test validates the starter bundle automation from the GitHub AI agent.
